title: critical information disclosure
content:
Description:
hey all ,
I have found critical information through this endpoint ████
on ███████ DB credentials such as DB_NAME,DB_USER,DB_PASSWORD,DB_HOST, etc..
Impact
full access control on DB service on website
System Host(s)
███
Affected Product(s) and Version(s)
CVE Numbers
Steps to Reproduce
Go to
██████/████████?aam-media=1
you nedd to put ?aam-media=1 to bypass blank page
Suggested Mitigation/Remediation Actions
steps: Access the endpoint ████/████████?aam-media=1 to bypass the blank page.
Observe the exposed database credentials (DB_NAME, DB_USER, DB_PASSWORD, DB_HOST, etc.) in the response.
vuln_description: Critical information disclosure vulnerability exposing database credentials (DB_NAME, DB_USER, DB_PASSWORD, DB_HOST) via a specific endpoint. This allows full access control to the database service.
reason: The vulnerability involves a straightforward endpoint access with a simple bypass parameter (?aam-media=1). There are no complex interactions, state manipulations, or novel logic required to exploit it.
